column4: ok, so im still trying to install libdvdcss2 but this is what i get now
libdvdcss2: Depends: libc6 (>= 2.6-1) but 2.5-0ubuntu14 is to be installed
i was also wondering, how do i make my own channels?
download your libdvdcss for your feisty or update to gutsy
i would, but i have no media to backup with, unless i can have it copy all my users accounts, and even then, i dont hacve any blank cds, and my free cd requests are being denied now
is there a way for me to import user accounts when reinstalling?

i have done that upgrade before, but the side affect was [this was going from 6.10 to 7.04] that the main boot kernel was fried, and hung trying to mount file system, therefore, i prefer a clean install, importing accounts if at all possible
it means you download from the wrong repo
download the package from a feisty repo not a gutsy one
you've been told how to get the proper one
no hdd and boot from disk is contradictory
i meant boot from cd type disk, i use "disk" as slang for "cd"  alot, my bad
cat6 standard networking cable, using crossover wireing
that's not ubuntu related. that's ahrdware
